properties.name: spring.cloud.stream.solace.binder.smfHost
properties.description: IP Address and port number for SMF connection to the router. Default port for VMR and appliance is 55555

properties.name: spring.cloud.stream.solace.binder.msgVpn
properties.description: Which message VPN to use. VMR is configured OOTB with a VPN called *default*

properties.name: spring.cloud.stream.solace.binder.username
properties.description: Which identity to use. VMR is configured OOTB with a username called *default*

properties.name: spring.cloud.stream.solace.binder.password
properties.description: Password for the identity. VMR is configured OOTB with no password for the username called *default*

properties.name: spring.cloud.stream.solace.binder.password
properties.description: Password for the identity. VMR is configured OOTB with no password for the username called *default*
